abstract: Citigroup plans to start auctioning off its Japanese brokerage unit, Nikko Cordial Securities, as early as this month, and the country’s top three banks are expected to place bids in a deal likely to be worth up to $3.4 billion, Reuters reported, citing people with the knowledge of the matter.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup plans to start auctioning off its Japanese brokerage unit, Nikko Cordial Securities, as early as this month, and the country’s top three banks are expected to place bids in a deal likely to be worth up to $3.4 billion, Reuters reported, citing people with the knowledge of the matter.

headline.main: Citigroup Plans Auction of Nikko Cordial, Report Says
